description.value: Minor Boon (Single Use) Pleased by your talent for manipulation, Asmodeus amplifies your skills. Once, when you fail at the Diplomacy check to make a significant or consequential @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Request]{Request}, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Suggestion]{Suggestion} on the target of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Request]{Request}, suggesting the same course of action. This is a divine innate spell.
